events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but I need to request a refund because the size is completely wrong and doesn't fit at all.
The customer's request has been categorized as a Refund case due to sizing issues and request for money back.
Assigning the case to refund specialist agent to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand that you would like to request a refund for your jacket due to sizing issues.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in original condition for processing the refund?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and yes, the jacket is unused and still has all the tags attached as it is brand new.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process once the jacket is returned to our warehouse. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thank you for your help and quick response. I appreciate receiving the return label to start the process.
The refund case is now resolved; the customer was provided the return label and instructions to send back the jacket for processing.
We are checking if you have sent the jacket back successfully and if the refund has been processed to your satisfaction.
I have shipped the jacket yesterday and already received confirmation that the refund was processed. Thanks for your support!
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
